short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Go back to previous page by swiping left with two fingers on a trackpad.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Go back to previous page by swiping left with two fingers on a trackpad. This extension emulates swipe back in a Mac magic trackpad. You don't need this extension on a Mac computer.
